Name: Hansel And Gretel
About the game: Play as Hansel And Gretel in a puzzle-adventure game based on the fairy tale by the brothers Grimm. Key Features: - Play Single-player or Local Multiplayer. - Unique puzzles. - Classic-Inspired Pixel Graphics. - More than 40 types of items. - Hidden Secrets & Magical creatures. - Enjoy beautiful soundtracks. - The game is about 1 hour long.
